Book Storage: You can use the tissue box as a bookend or a book storage solution for small books.
Gift Wrapping: You can use the tissue box as a template to create custom gift wrapping paper.
Plant Pot: You can use the tissue box as a planter for small indoor plants.
Pet House: You can use the tissue box as a home for small pets such as hamsters or gerbils.
Photo Holder: You can use the tissue box as a photo holder to display pictures.
